setup_action_args
=================

.. py:module:: setup_action_args


Attributes
----------

.. autoapisummary::

   setup_action_args.__author__

---------

.. autoapisummary::

Module Contents
---------------

.. py:data:: __author__
   :value: 'tiantheunissen@gmail.com'


.. py:data:: __description__
   :value: 'Checks, filters, and adjusts user arguments for various actions in KnowIt.'


   ------------------
   Action arguments
   ------------------

   The user interacts with KnowIt by sending arguments or paths to external files.
   This script contains a function ``setup_relevant_args`` that checks arguments.


.. py:data:: logger

.. py:data:: arg_dict

.. py:function:: setup_relevant_args(experiment_dict, required_types=None)

.. py:function:: setup_type_args(experiment_dict, arg_type)
